description:
Lina Inverse is sweet sixteen on her solitary journey to Atlas City. Not many people know that she is a powerful sorceress and at the same time a great swordswoman.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Angry? Lina Ikari no Drag Slave!
Angry? リナ怒りのドラグスレイブ!
En colère ! Lina et le Drag Slave en furie !
Eşti furios? Dragonul furios al Linei!
